name: CASE_HSB
description: This table extracts the episodes linked to the case.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LINKED_EPISODES_ID
columns.description: Stores the episode of care that is linked to the case.
